paper_abstract: Well defined business processes are a crucial success factor for deploying SOA/SOKU architectures. In this paper, the declarative business process description language-ROsWeL-which supports applications compatible with ROA, is discussed. ROsWeL provides a declarative, reliable and semi-automatic composition of RESTful web services, enriched by the knowledge representation. The paper discusses benefits of ROsWeL, and presents an example of a simple workow that captures essential ROsWeL features.
paper_title: ROsWeL Workflow Language: A Declarative, Resource-oriented Approach
